snippet.title: THE WAVE | Justin Long Faces a Night That Changes Everything | Full Movie
snippet.description:
A night out begins to feel strangely unfamiliar.
What follows blurs the line between perception and reality.

Frank, an insurance lawyer on the brink of a promotion, heads out for a night of celebration with his co-worker Jeff. After ingesting a mysterious substance, Frank’s perception of the world begins to shift in unexpected ways. As reality starts to feel unstable, he’s forced to question what’s real, what’s imagined, and how far this experience might take him.

Director: Gille Klabin
Cast: Justin Long, Donald Faison, Tommy Flanagan, Sheila Vand, Katia Winter.
© Published under license.
#TheWave #FullMovie #MysteryThriller #Psychological #Drama
